TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageTheme extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示页主题的基类，页主题是用于定义网站中的页和控件之间统一外观的资源的集合。

span.span: Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site.

summary.span: 可以通过配置或页指令设置页主题。

span.span: The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面和控件开发人员不会 直接使用、 或 类。Page and control developers do not use the , , or classes directly. ASP.NET 分析器和运行时使用这些类将 ASP.NET 主题和控件外观文件中定义的样式表元素应用于页面和特定类型的控件。These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls. 页面开发人员使用和属性启用 (或禁用) 页面主题 。Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the and properties. 有关页面主题的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information about page themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Themes and Skins Overview

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取 对象的目录的相对 URL。

span.span: When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the object.

value.span: 一个字符串值，包含 目录的相对 URL。

span.span: A string value containing the relative URL of the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是抽象的。The property is abstract. 在编译时，主题将生成重写属性的代码 。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the property. 方法使用 属性将相对 url 解析为绝对 url。The method uses the property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取可用于当前页主题的所有默认外观的名称的 接口（根据控件类型进行索引）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.

value.span: 一个 ，表示与当前页主题关联的控件外观。

span.span: An that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是抽象的。The property is abstract. 在编译时，主题将生成重写此属性的代码。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取链接到此页的样式表的数组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of style sheets that are linked to this page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是抽象的，并且必须在派生类中实现。The property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class. 在编译时，主题将生成重写此属性的代码。When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

summary.span: 为分析和计算主题外观文件中的 XPath 数据绑定表达式提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression in theme skin files.
